{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-13T15:02:27.000Z", "description": "

** Multiple Roles - Immediate Interview & Start **


W2 (Preferred).


HOSPITALITY INDUSTRY CLIENT (FORTUNE COMPANY)


Role:           Machine Learning/ Data Science/ Data Engineer

Location:    San Francisco Bay Area (Remote work until pandemic)

Duration:    Long Term Contract


Job Description:

\u25cf 5+ years of industry experience or a PhD + 2 years industry experience in applied

machine learning.

\u25cf Strong coding skills in Python/Java/Scala or equivalent

\u25cf Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow and

popular ML frameworks like Tensorflow or Pytorch is preferred

\u25cf Solid understanding of engineering best practices and complexities of models in

production

\u25cf Experience developing and productionizing machine learning models is a plus

\u25cf Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Spark is a plus

\u25cf Experience with distributed data processing tools like Hive, Spark, Airflow is a plus

\u25cf Industry experience building end-to-end Machine Learning Infrastructure a big

plus


If you are interested to pursue this opportunity, please send your updated resume to Sam@agiledatapro.com
